steps.name: the recipe "Pasta" does not include "bacon"
I try to update the recipe ingredient with name "bacon" in recipe "Pasta" to have quantity "2.0" and unit "slice"
I should see an error message "Recipe ingredient with name 'bacon' not found"

name: US006 Update a recipe ingredient
description:
As a NomNom user,
  I want to modify a recipe ingredient,
  So that it can have the right information.
